subject: Confused about electives
body: Hi advisor, I am not sure whether to take Data Mining or Cloud Computing next term. Could you please guide me?

subject: Scholarship renewal
body: Do I need to maintain a 3.5 GPA to renew my scholarship next year, or is 3.0 sufficient?

subject: Consulting recruiting timeline
body: When should I start preparing for consulting recruiting, and are there any Smith resources for case practice?

subject: Exam conflict
body: Two of my midterms are scheduled on the same day. What is the process to request a change?

subject: Feeling overwhelmed
body: I am feeling overwhelmed adjusting to a new country and coursework. Are there any support resources I can reach out to?
